ADMIN_ONLY_OPERATION.title: admin-restricted-operation
ADMIN_ONLY_OPERATION.message: This operation is restricted to administrators only.

APP_NOT_AUTHORIZED.title: app-not-authorized
APP_NOT_AUTHORIZED.message: This app, identified by the domain where it's hosted, is not authorized to use Firebase Authentication with the provided API key. Review your key configuration in the Google API console.

APP_NOT_INSTALLED.title: app-not-installed
APP_NOT_INSTALLED.message: The requested mobile application corresponding to the identifier (Android package name or iOS bundle ID) provided is not installed on this device.

CAPTCHA_CHECK_FAILED.title: captcha-check-failed
CAPTCHA_CHECK_FAILED.message: The reCAPTCHA response token provided is either invalid, expired, already used or the domain associated with it does not match the list of whitelisted domains.

CODE_EXPIRED.title: code-expired
CODE_EXPIRED.message: The SMS code has expired. Please re-send the verification code to try again.

CREDENTIAL_ALREADY_IN_USE.title: credential-already-in-use
CREDENTIAL_ALREADY_IN_USE.message: This credential is already associated with a different user account.

CREDENTIAL_MISMATCH.title: custom-token-mismatch
CREDENTIAL_MISMATCH.message: The custom token corresponds to a different audience.

CREDENTIAL_TOO_OLD_LOGIN_AGAIN.title: requires-recent-login
CREDENTIAL_TOO_OLD_LOGIN_AGAIN.message: This operation is sensitive and requires recent authentication. Log in again before retrying this request.

DYNAMIC_LINK_NOT_ACTIVATED.title: dynamic-link-not-activated
DYNAMIC_LINK_NOT_ACTIVATED.message: Please activate Dynamic Links in the Firebase Console and agree to the terms and conditions.

EMAIL_CHANGE_NEEDS_VERIFICATION.title: email-change-needs-verification
EMAIL_CHANGE_NEEDS_VERIFICATION.message: Multi-factor users must always have a verified email.

EMAIL_EXISTS.title: email-already-in-use
EMAIL_EXISTS.message: The email address is already in use by another account.

EMAIL_NOT_FOUND.title: email-not-found
EMAIL_NOT_FOUND.message: Enter a valid email or create an account.

EMULATOR_CONFIG_FAILED.title: emulator-config-failed
EMULATOR_CONFIG_FAILED.message: Auth instance has already been used to make a network call. Auth can no longer be configured to use the emulator. Try calling "useEmulator()" sooner.

EXPIRED_POPUP_REQUEST.title: cancelled-popup-request
EXPIRED_POPUP_REQUEST.message: This operation has been cancelled due to another conflicting popup being opened.

INVALID_API_KEY.title: invalid-api-key
INVALID_API_KEY.message: Your API key is invalid, please check you have copied it correctly.

INVALID_APP_CREDENTIAL.title: invalid-app-credential
INVALID_APP_CREDENTIAL.message: The phone verification request contains an invalid application verifier. The reCAPTCHA token response is either invalid or expired.

INVALID_APP_ID.title: invalid-app-id
INVALID_APP_ID.message: The mobile app identifier is not registed for the current project.

INVALID_AUTH.title: invalid-user-token
INVALID_AUTH.message: This user's credential isn't valid for this project. This can happen if the user's token has been tampered with, or if the user isn't for the project associated with this API key.

INVALID_CERT_HASH.title: invalid-cert-hash
INVALID_CERT_HASH.message: The SHA-1 certificate hash provided is invalid.

INVALID_CODE.title: invalid-verification-code
INVALID_CODE.message: The SMS verification code used to create the phone auth credential is invalid. Please resend the verification code sms and be sure use the verification code provided by the user.

INVALID_CONTINUE_URI.title: invalid-continue-uri
INVALID_CONTINUE_URI.message: The continue URL provided in the request is invalid.

INVALID_CORDOVA_CONFIGURATION.title: invalid-cordova-configuration
INVALID_CORDOVA_CONFIGURATION.message: The following Cordova plugins must be installed to enable OAuth sign-in: cordova-plugin-buildinfo, cordova-universal-links-plugin, cordova-plugin-browsertab, cordova-plugin-inappbrowser and cordova-plugin-customurlscheme.

INVALID_CUSTOM_TOKEN.title: invalid-custom-token
INVALID_CUSTOM_TOKEN.message: The custom token format is incorrect. Please check the documentation.

INVALID_DYNAMIC_LINK_DOMAIN.title: invalid-dynamic-link-domain
INVALID_DYNAMIC_LINK_DOMAIN.message: The provided dynamic link domain is not configured or authorized for the current project.

INVALID_EMAIL.title: invalid-email
INVALID_EMAIL.message: The email address is badly formatted.

INVALID_IDP_RESPONSE.title: invalid-credential
INVALID_IDP_RESPONSE.message: The supplied auth credential is malformed or has expired.

INVALID_MESSAGE_PAYLOAD.title: invalid-message-payload
INVALID_MESSAGE_PAYLOAD.message: The email template corresponding to this action contains invalid characters in its message. Please fix by going to the Auth email templates section in the Firebase Console.

INVALID_MFA_SESSION.title: invalid-multi-factor-session
INVALID_MFA_SESSION.message: The request does not contain a valid proof of first factor successful sign-in.

INVALID_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.title: invalid-oauth-client-id
INVALID_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.message: The OAuth client ID provided is either invalid or does not match the specified API key.

INVALID_OAUTH_PROVIDER.title: invalid-oauth-provider
INVALID_OAUTH_PROVIDER.message: EmailAuthProvider is not supported for this operation. This operation only supports OAuth providers.

INVALID_OOB_CODE.title: invalid-action-code
INVALID_OOB_CODE.message: The action code is invalid. This can happen if the code is malformed, expired, or has already been used.

INVALID_ORIGIN.title: unauthorized-domain
INVALID_ORIGIN.message: This domain is not authorized for OAuth operations for your Firebase project. Edit the list of authorized domains from the Firebase console.

INVALID_PASSWORD.title: wrong-password
INVALID_PASSWORD.message: The password is invalid or the user does not have a password.

INVALID_PERSISTENCE.title: invalid-persistence-type
INVALID_PERSISTENCE.message: The specified persistence type is invalid. It can only be local, session or none.

INVALID_PHONE_NUMBER.title: invalid-phone-number
INVALID_PHONE_NUMBER.message: The format of the phone number provided is incorrect. Please enter the phone number in a format that can be parsed into E.164 format. E.164 phone numbers are written in the format [+][country code][subscriber number including area code].

INVALID_PROVIDER_ID.title: invalid-provider-id
INVALID_PROVIDER_ID.message: The specified provider ID is invalid.

INVALID_RECIPIENT_EMAIL.title: invalid-recipient-email
INVALID_RECIPIENT_EMAIL.message: The email corresponding to this action failed to send as the provided recipient email address is invalid.

INVALID_SENDER.title: invalid-sender
INVALID_SENDER.message: The email template corresponding to this action contains an invalid sender email or name. Please fix by going to the Auth email templates section in the Firebase Console.

INVALID_SESSION_INFO.title: invalid-verification-id
INVALID_SESSION_INFO.message: The verification ID used to create the phone auth credential is invalid.

INVALID_TENANT_ID.title: invalid-tenant-id
INVALID_TENANT_ID.message: The Auth instance's tenant ID is invalid.

MFA_INFO_NOT_FOUND.title: multi-factor-info-not-found
MFA_INFO_NOT_FOUND.message: The user does not have a second factor matching the identifier provided.

MFA_REQUIRED.title: multi-factor-auth-required
MFA_REQUIRED.message: Proof of ownership of a second factor is required to complete sign-in.

MISSING_ANDROID_PACKAGE_NAME.title: missing-android-pkg-name
MISSING_ANDROID_PACKAGE_NAME.message: An Android Package Name must be provided if the Android App is required to be installed.

MISSING_APP_CREDENTIAL.title: missing-app-credential
MISSING_APP_CREDENTIAL.message: The phone verification request is missing an application verifier assertion. A reCAPTCHA response token needs to be provided.

MISSING_AUTH_DOMAIN.title: auth-domain-config-required
MISSING_AUTH_DOMAIN.message: Be sure to include authDomain when calling firebase.initializeApp(), by following the instructions in the Firebase console.

MISSING_CODE.title: missing-verification-code
MISSING_CODE.message: The phone auth credential was created with an empty SMS verification code.

MISSING_CONTINUE_URI.title: missing-continue-uri
MISSING_CONTINUE_URI.message: A continue URL must be provided in the request.

MISSING_IOS_BUNDLE_ID.title: missing-ios-bundle-id
MISSING_IOS_BUNDLE_ID.message: An iOS Bundle ID must be provided if an App Store ID is provided.

MISSING_OR_INVALID_NONCE.title: missing-or-invalid-nonce
MISSING_OR_INVALID_NONCE.message: The request does not contain a valid nonce. This can occur if the SHA-256 hash of the provided raw nonce does not match the hashed nonce in the ID token payload.

MISSING_MFA_INFO.title: missing-multi-factor-info
MISSING_MFA_INFO.message: No second factor identifier is provided.

MISSING_MFA_SESSION.title: missing-multi-factor-session
MISSING_MFA_SESSION.message: The request is missing proof of first factor successful sign-in.

MISSING_PHONE_NUMBER.title: missing-phone-number
MISSING_PHONE_NUMBER.message: To send verification codes, provide a phone number for the recipient.

MISSING_SESSION_INFO.title: missing-verification-id
MISSING_SESSION_INFO.message: The phone auth credential was created with an empty verification ID.

MODULE_DESTROYED.title: app-deleted
MODULE_DESTROYED.message: This instance of FirebaseApp has been deleted.

NEED_CONFIRMATION.title: account-exists-with-different-credential
NEED_CONFIRMATION.message: An account already exists with the same email address but different sign-in credentials. Sign in using a provider associated with this email address.

NETWORK_REQUEST_FAILED.title: network-request-failed
NETWORK_REQUEST_FAILED.message: A network AuthError (such as timeout, interrupted connection or unreachable host) has occurred.

NULL_USER.title: null-user
NULL_USER.message: A null user object was provided as the argument for an operation which requires a non-null user object.

NO_SUCH_PROVIDER.title: no-such-provider
NO_SUCH_PROVIDER.message: User was not linked to an account with the given provider.

OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED.title: operation-not-allowed
OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED.message: The given sign-in provider is disabled for this Firebase project. Enable it in the Firebase console, under the sign-in method tab of the Auth section.

OPERATION_NOT_SUPPORTED.title: operation-not-supported-in-this-environment
OPERATION_NOT_SUPPORTED.message: This operation is not supported in the environment this application is running on. "location.protocol" must be http, https or chrome-extension and web storage must be enabled.

POPUP_BLOCKED.title: popup-blocked
POPUP_BLOCKED.message: Unable to establish a connection with the popup. It may have been blocked by the browser.

POPUP_CLOSED_BY_USER.title: popup-closed-by-user
POPUP_CLOSED_BY_USER.message: The popup has been closed by the user before finalizing the operation.

PROVIDER_ALREADY_LINKED.title: provider-already-linked
PROVIDER_ALREADY_LINKED.message: User can only be linked to one identity for the given provider.

QUOTA_EXCEEDED.title: quota-exceeded
QUOTA_EXCEEDED.message: The project's quota for this operation has been exceeded.

REDIRECT_CANCELLED_BY_USER.title: redirect-cancelled-by-user
REDIRECT_CANCELLED_BY_USER.message: The redirect operation has been cancelled by the user before finalizing.

REDIRECT_OPERATION_PENDING.title: redirect-operation-pending
REDIRECT_OPERATION_PENDING.message: A redirect sign-in operation is already pending.

REJECTED_CREDENTIAL.title: rejected-credential
REJECTED_CREDENTIAL.message: The request contains malformed or mismatching credentials.

SECOND_FACTOR_ALREADY_ENROLLED.title: second-factor-already-in-use
SECOND_FACTOR_ALREADY_ENROLLED.message: The second factor is already enrolled on this account.

SECOND_FACTOR_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.title: maximum-second-factor-count-exceeded
SECOND_FACTOR_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.message: The maximum allowed number of second factors on a user has been exceeded.

TENANT_ID_MISMATCH.title: tenant-id-mismatch
TENANT_ID_MISMATCH.message: The provided tenant ID does not match the Auth instance's tenant ID

TOKEN_EXPIRED.title: user-token-expired
TOKEN_EXPIRED.message: The user's credential is no longer valid. The user must sign in again.

TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS_TRY_LATER.title: too-many-requests
TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS_TRY_LATER.message: We have blocked all requests from this device due to unusual activity. Try again later.

UNAUTHORIZED_DOMAIN.title: unauthorized-continue-uri
UNAUTHORIZED_DOMAIN.message: The domain of the continue URL is not whitelisted.  Please whitelist the domain in the Firebase console.

UNSUPPORTED_FIRST_FACTOR.title: unsupported-first-factor
UNSUPPORTED_FIRST_FACTOR.message: Enrolling a second factor or signing in with a multi-factor account requires sign-in with a supported first factor.

UNSUPPORTED_PERSISTENCE.title: unsupported-persistence-type
UNSUPPORTED_PERSISTENCE.message: The current environment does not support the specified persistence type.

UNSUPPORTED_TENANT_OPERATION.title: unsupported-tenant-operation
UNSUPPORTED_TENANT_OPERATION.message: This operation is not supported in a multi-tenant context.

UNVERIFIED_EMAIL.title: unverified-email
UNVERIFIED_EMAIL.message: The operation requires a verified email.

USER_CANCELLED.title: user-cancelled
USER_CANCELLED.message: The user did not grant your application the permissions it requested.

USER_DELETED.title: user-not-found
USER_DELETED.message: There is no user record corresponding to this identifier. The user may have been deleted.

USER_DISABLED.title: user-disabled
USER_DISABLED.message: The user account has been disabled by an administrator.

USER_MISMATCH.title: user-mismatch
USER_MISMATCH.message: The supplied credentials do not correspond to the previously signed in user.

WEAK_PASSWORD.title: weak-password
WEAK_PASSWORD.message: The password must be 6 characters long or more.

WEB_STORAGE_UNSUPPORTED.title: web-storage-unsupported
WEB_STORAGE_UNSUPPORTED.message: This browser is not supported or 3rd party cookies and data may be disabled.
